title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should show the content in the given format
Actual Result: Tips show the content in one line
OB: When putting a large content in a text item and hovering the mouse over it, the tips for the text item is displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips for the text item should be displayed in the expected format, even when the content is large.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text item in the layout
2. Enter the text as 'Contents'
3. Hover the mouse over the text item

The tips for the text item should be displayed in the expected format, regardless of the content size.
